name: Federal budget authority for R&D and R&D plant, by budget function, ordered by FY 2017 R&D and R&D plant total: FYs 2017–19

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Percent change is calculated on unrounded data. The application of the new experimental development definition is shown across all years.
sources: Agencies' submissions to the Office of Management and Budget per MAX Schedule C, agencies' budget justification documents, and supplemental data obtained from agencies' budget offices.
